API_Description: Represents the container hosting the PDF document, providing access to the environment in which the document is displayed.
API_Description_Reason: The name 'hostContainer' suggests it refers to the environment or container in which the PDF is hosted, which is common in APIs that interact with embedded or hosted content.
Returns: An object representing the host environment of the PDF document.
Returns_Reason: Properties typically return a value or object that represents the state or configuration of the object they belong to. In this case, 'hostContainer' likely returns an object related to the hosting environment.
